title: Worth a visit
text: Had a quick lunch here on the tables outside. Friendly staff and good falafels. Inside the ppace is really traditional, clean and cozy. Very fair prices and service overall

title: Sehr gute Kneipe
text: This place might look hidden and dark but once you are inside the atmosphere is very comfy. Girl at the bar was very friendly and talkable, we had some drinks and snacks with some good music. Good pub

title: Gosh, the cakes :)
text: Really nice and elegant café in the very center of Jena. Friendly staff. They also offer cakes and sweets to tale away but you can also sit and anjeoy a tasty piece of cake, they really have a lot of choice. It is a bit pricy but worth it.

title: For potato lovers
text:
Had been here 8 years ago but came back because of the good memories. Food is good, large variesty of dishes, base ingredient is obviously potato but combined in a lot of different ways.
Fair prices, cozy place and friendly staff. Also very well located into the main square of Jena

title: Best currywurst ever
text: Always a good idea to come to fritz mitte. Fritz deal is the best option, good fries, tasty currywurst and different types of mayo. Fair prices, cozy modern place. Highly recommended :)

title: Really good schnitzel
text:
We had a really good, big and tasty Schnitzel here with traditional potato cucumber salad. Nice lemon in the little package. Staff is friendly and the place is really nice but not that fancy.
Advice: go on Sunday because they have a special offer, since it's Schnitzeltag!

title: Good pizza and fair prices
text: Have been here for the first time and I am positively satisfied. Nice and funny italian staff, alternative place, perfectly located in Kreuzberg. Good prices, overall a good food experience.

title: Mhe
text: The place is really nice, modern and well equipped, staff was a bit slow in attending and misunderstood my order. Got a maple bbq and was not satisfied with it. Wanted to try the big home made onion rings but they didn't have anymore. Sweet potato fries were too salty. But fair prices and good deals.

title: True Italian pizza!
text: This place has been a positive discovery, we got a panzerotto and shared a fried pizza (o' cazone), both of them were really delicious! Prices are fair, some of the pizza are even cheaper than the ones offered in other restaurants, and the quality is high! Nice place and location but the staff was a bit overwhelmed and wasn't super fast. Hope it was just an isolated case! In general, a very good experience!

title: Typical polish dish
text: Small but cozy dumpling place. Prices are fair and staff is fast and really nice. We had the typical meat and ruski pierogi with sour cream and cranberry sauce, they were really good. Great location, a few minutes from the main square

title: Sweet treat
text: Amazing place, really nice blond multitasking guy and delicious nutella brownie chimney with softeis. Good location a fair prices

title: Pizza fritta a Berlino
text: Real Italian place with Italian stuff and atmosphere. They have a nice outdoor terrace for the summer period but also a lot of tables inside for the winter season. They have all kind of pizzas, also the typical fried one, which is really tasty. Prices are fair for being Berlin and the staff is friendly.

title: Nice lunch break from the beach
text: They have a lot of nice tables outside the restaurant but also plenty inside. They mainly serve fish dishes but they also have many different food choices for everyone. The staff is nice, could be improved a bit but in general has been a pleasent break from the beach, which is next to the restaurant.

title: Only open bar on a Friday night
text: After walking for a bit around the city center, we ended at this nice bar at the harbor with a bit of night vibes, cocktails and music. Staff is friendly (especially the guy from Rome) and the bar is located at the harbor.

title: Piadina at the harbor
text: Had the typical food of the area, the piadina and it was good. Fries are really tasty as well. Staff is nice, very funny and friendly. Price is fair. They have tables at the harbor but also inside.

title: Really nice hotel
text: Have been here with two friends for one night. Check in and out is smooth and the staff at the reception is friendly and helpful (especially Marco). Small but cozy room with amazing shower and all the services you need. The breakfast is good, you have a large choice of food. Location is great, not on the main street but close to the beach and everything you may need. Only flaw is the parking lot which is 10 min walking from the hotel and need to be charged separately.

title: Buona la crescia
text: We wanted to try the typical crescia with ciauscolo and pecorino. Was a good choice for 5€. Really nice and cozy location with a couple of tables to sit inside. There are a lot of different products to buy and the two guys workig there are really nice.

title: Good ice cream
text: Had ice cream twice, a simple one (cono) and a real "coppa" for dinner. It is really good and the price is the normal one you will get nowadays. The location is in the main square and the staff is nice

title: Very positive experience
text: Had lunch here with my family and everything was amazing. Really good food (they have a couple of main dishes a day, which makes it fresh and unique) in this wonderful little garden sorrounded by nature. All the the waiters were nice, friendly and helpful. I can highly recommend it to everyone who stops by to have a snack or a proper meal!

title: Good view but the service needs to improve
text: The place is really nice, a lot of space indoor and outdoor with a nice terrace with sea view. There are a lot of paintings and pictures on the walls which don't look so tidy. The food is good but the service could be better. A lot of waiters and a bit confusing. Price is ok.

title: Amazing dinner in the countryside
text: Have been with some friends and had dinner on the beautiful terrace next to the castle. View is great and food as well. Good price and very friendly staff. Good escape from the city with a good meal.

title: Cremy ice cream
text: Amazing ice cream! Big variety of flavours, all tasty and creamy. Nice stop to have a great snack! Staff is friendly and thr place inside is modern and very welcoming!

title: Amazing food into the woods
text: After the renovation they made, it has positively changed a lot. The place is tiny but cozy and in summer they have a backyard which literally goes into the Parco Ferrari nearby. Food is amazing, looks like street food, simply but tasty food. Price is awesome and staff is fast, professional and friendly. I recommend it in case you would like to taste some original modenese food with good price.

title: Tasty burguer
text:
I have been here a couple of days ago because a good friend recommend it to me.
I have to say that the burguer quality is very good and the service very friendly and fast. Had bbq burguer with sweet potatoe fries but they have a lot of variety in the menu. Prices are fair and portions as well. Not the typical place where they bring you a lto of food which you can't even finish.
It is situated in kollwitz (Prenzlauer Berg), which makes it a very nice area to have dinner with friends, especially outside with good weather.

title: Best sweet potatoes I ever had
text: I have ordered the burger online and it was tasty and really good. The sweet potatoes were amazing! Never have been there, looking forward to. Service is really nice and friendly.

title: Not as expected
text: The place is really nice and cozy and the staff is really nice, friendly and helpful but the food was not as good as expected. Maybe we didn't choose the most typical dishes, spaghetti with sour cream and grated cheese wss awful.

title: Good food
text: Typical place from Südtirol with traditional cuisine, friendly staff and cozy restaurant. A bit pricy but it's fair around here.

title: For seafood lovers
text: I have been here with some friends (who really love this place) and we tried a lot of different types of dishes, they were all good and well presented. The staff is amazing and the chef personally comes to your table to chat and make sure everything is fine. The restaurant is a bit hidden but cozy and beautiful. The prices are a bit high but this is the only negative point about Rocoto

title: Fancy (but good) Italian place
text: The place is very beautiful, cozy and with good atmosphere, there are pictures of Italian people and traditions on the wall, which give family vibes. The food is handmade and really good, a bit expensive bit this is what you pay if you want good food quality! Staff is really nice, especially the waiter from Kossovo (don't know his name). Thank you for your good treat!
